Slider Help

Enter multiple subreddits, or a username, then click fetch to grab the images from reddit. Slideshow fetches the images and begins the slideshow.

Shortcuts

  • S/Space - Begin slideshow.
  • Esc - Close image viewer.
  • Right - Next slide.
  • Left - Previous slide.
  • Up - On an imgur album, enter the album to view pictures.
  • Down - Exit album viewing mode and just look at cover pictures.
